Package com.esri.mo2.ui.bean

Java beans and associated classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColorChangeListener Defines the interface of ColorChangeListener.
LayerHandler Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, please consult the classes in the com.esri.mo2.ui.cat packages.
PickListener An interface for objects that need to be notified about PickEvents.
RendererHandler Allows you to add Renderer types to the RendererEditor of the Layer bean.
RubberBand Adjusts the size of an associated Geometry object according to certain Mouse Events that are passed to it.
SpinnerListener Defines the interface of SpinnerListener.
TocListener Implements an interface for objects wishing to be notified about TocEvents.
 

Class Summary
AcetateLayer A transparent JComponent that contains a com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.Layer.
ArcImsLayerChooser Deprecated. - It has been replaced by the com.esri.mo2.ui.cat.DatasetChooserDialog and com.esri.mo2.ui.cat.Arcims4ConnectionDialog.
BasePick A helper class for building Tools that respond to mouse clicks within a map, then transmit PickEvents based on the result.
BasePick.Result This result is returned within an Iterator by the searchEnvelope method.
BaseRubberBand A basic implementation of RubberBand.
BaseRubberCircle Displays a rubberbanding Circle.
BaseRubberEnvelope Displays a rubberbanding Envelope.
BaseRubberPoint Displays a rubberbanding Point.
BaseRubberPolygon Displays a rubberbanding Polygon.
BaseRubberPolyline Displays a rubberbanding Polyline.
ColorButton This class extends javax.swing.JButton class and creates an Icon which displays the color as selected by the user.
ColorChangeEvent A ColorChangeEvent is triggered by the ColorButton when a change takes place in the color selected by the user.
ColorComboBox Implements an interface for selecting a color.
ColorComboBoxBean Implements an interface for selecting a color.
ColorDialog A color selection dialog user interface.
ColorDialogAlpha Similar to the ColorDialog class, this class provides an Alpha tab to control the transparency of the selected color.
ComponentVisitor An utility class that can be used to perform repetitive functions in a component hierarchy.
CustomDatasetChooser The CustomDatasetChooser is a user interface used by a Layer bean during the design-time to set up the layers's dataset property.
CustomDatasetEditor Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated.
DatasetEditor The DatasetEditor class is used in the design-time bound with dataset property of a Layer bean in an IDE tool.
DragTool A type of Tool component that can be added to a Map to receive and process its mouse motion events.
FeatureLegend Represents a FeatureLayer within the Toc.
FontChooser Provides a panel that displays a font picker.
GroupLegend Represents a GroupLayer within the Toc.
Identify When selected, a single click in the Map causes this Tool to obtain one or more Features located near the mouse click location.
Layer This component can be added to a Map bean in an IDE at design time.
LayerBeanInfo The BeanInfo file for the Layer bean.
Legend A visual representation of a Layer within a Table of Contents (Toc).
Map A Map is a "Java Swing" component that displays geographic information on a canvas, and provides a way for users to interact with the data shown there.
MapBeanInfo A BeanInfo class associated with the Map bean.
MapScrollPanel Provides a scrollable view of a Map component.
MapScrollPaneLayout A layout manager helps MapScrollPanel manage its components.
MarkupFeatureElement Maintains the "state" information for a BaseFeatureElement on an acetate layer.
MarkupTool This class allows you to edit map layers.
OverviewMap This class displays one or more layers on a Map at a larger extent compared with the Map.
OverviewMapBeanInfo A BeanInfo class associated with the OverviewMap bean.
Pan When the Pan Tool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin "panning".
PanPanel The handy class is primarily designed to help to pan map in the different directions.
PanPanelBeanInfo A bean info class for PanPanel bean.
PanPanelPropertyEditor The PanPanelPropertyEditor is a PropertyEditorSupport class.
PanZoom Combines the functions of the Pan and Zoom tools.
PersistentSelectCircle Displays a ruberbanding Circle.
PersistentSelectPoly Allows the selection geometry to persist as the user fine tunes the selection process.
Pick When the Pick Tool is selected, a single click in the Map causes this Tool to obtain one or more Features located near the mouse click location.
PickAdapter Adapter implementation of the PickListener.
PickEvent This event is sent to a PickListener whenever a Pick Tool needs to notify certain data from the Pick Layer.
Print This component can be used for printing the map and TOC with the pre-defined page size (11 x 8.5).
RendererEditor The RendererEditor class is used in the design-time bound with renderer property of a Layer bean in an IDE tool.
RubberBandTool When the RubberBandTool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin showing a RubberBand shape.
ScaleBar A ScaleBar is an visual component to show the displaying layer's scale in the numeric and graphic form.
ScaleBarBeanInfo A ScaleBar bean info class.
ScrollComboBox A ScrollComboBox provides an opportunity to choose an item from a list that is scrollable both in vertical and horizontal directions.
Select This Tool allows an end-user to spatially select Features within a FeatureLayer.
ShiftZoom When the ShiftZoom Tool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin "zooming".
Spinner The Spinner is a customized JSpinner class.
SpinnerEvent A SpinnerEvent is triggered by the Spinner bean.
Swatch Displays the symbolism for one LegendClass, or one combination of LegendCLasses that are shown in a FeatureLegend.
Toc A Table of Contents (TOC) is a visual representation of the Layers in a Map.
TocAdapter A simple adapter for TocListeners.
TocEvent This event is sent to a TocListener whenever certain changes occur to a Legend within a Toc.
Tool Map Tools are components that can be added to a Map for the purpose of receiving and processing MouseListener Events that occur in the Map.
Version Deprecated. version information now appears in another class
Zoom When the Zoom Tool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin "zooming".
ZoomIn When the ZoomIn Tool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin showing a "zoom" rectangle that has one corner anchored at the mousedown location.
ZoomOut When the ZoomOut Tool is selected, a mousePressed event will cause the Map to begin showing a "zoom" rectangle that has one corner anchored at the mousedown location.
ZoomRect This is the parent class for both the ZoomIn and ZoomOut Tools.
ZoomZoom Combines the functions of the ZoomIn and ZoomOut tools.
 

Exception Summary
LayerNotFoundException Thrown by Toc methods, when the Layer you specify is not found in the Toc.
NoMapException Thrown when you try to select a Tool that is not currently added to a Map.
 

Package com.esri.mo2.ui.bean Description

Java beans and associated classes. Normally these classes are exposed in a component bar of a 100% Java GUI builder.
